turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Modern schools of ninjutsu.
turn.1: What was the foundation of the Banke Shinobi school?
turn.2: The founder of Banke Shinobinoden school, Jinichi Kawakami, studied with Masazo Ishida.
turn.4: Thomas Dillon wrote, Jinichi Kawakami is supposedly the 21st Grand Master (Soke) of the "Koga Ban" clan, and the honorary director of the Iga-ryu Ninja Museum.
turn.6: Kawakami runs a dojo in Sagamihara-shi, Kanagawa Prefecture, but no longer accepts new students.
turn.7: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.8: Kawakami's student, Yasushi Kiyomoto, is also a teacher of this school.
turn.9: Have there been any controversies with the school?
turn.10: The validity of Dux's claims which have been disputed include his martial arts credentials; his fighting in the "Kumite"; and his prior military service.
turn.11: Who is the most famous student of the school?
turn.12: In 1998, in the Los Angeles superior court, Dux and Jean-Claude Van Damme were opposing litigants.
